data.name: _laboratoryIdentifier.AutoUpdateQuery
data.value:
<Declarations> <Regex Name='Digits' SelectionMode='FIRST' Pattern='[\d]+'><Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/Address1</Attribute></Regex> <Regex Name='Street' SelectionMode='FIRST' Pattern='((\b(?!ROAD\b)(?!BLVD\b)(?!DRIVE\b)(?!DR\.\b)(?!BOULEVARD\b)(?!AVE\b)(?!AVENUE\b)(?!PKWY\b)(?!PARKWAY\b)(?!WAY\b)(?!EAST\b)(?!SOUTH\b)(?!NORTH\b)(?!STREET\b)(?!RD\.\b)(?!AVE\.\b)(?!ST\.\b)(?!BLVD\.\b)(?!BOX\b)[A-Za-z]{3,})|(\d+(ST|ND|RD|TH)))'><Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/Address1</Attribute></Regex>
<Regex Name='FiveCharLab' SelectionMode='FIRST' Pattern='(\b(?!LABORATORY\b)(?!LAB\.?\b)(?!LABORATORIES\b)(?!MEDICAL\b)[-A-Za-z']{5,})'><Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Name</Attribute></Regex> <Regex Name='SecondWordLab' SelectionMode='FIRST' Pattern='(?<=[-A-Za-z']{5,}\x20)(\b(?!LABORATORY\b)(?!LAB\.?\b)(?!LABORATORIES\b)(?!MEDICAL\b)[-A-Za-z']{3,})'><Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Name</Attribute></Regex> <Regex Name='FirstTwoWordsLab' SelectionMode='FIRST' Pattern='[-'\w]+\s[-'\w]+'><Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Name</Attribute></Regex> <Regex Name='LabNameUpToComma' SelectionMode='FIRST' Pattern='.*(?=,.*)'><Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Name</Attribute></Regex>
<Expression Name='DigitsNotEmpty'> (<Digits/> == '') ? '___Empty___' : <Digits/> </Expression> <Expression Name='StreetNotEmpty'> (<Street/> == '') ? '___Empty___' : <Street/> </Expression> <Expression Name='FiveCharLabNotEmpty'> (<FiveCharLab/> == '') ? '___Empty___' : <FiveCharLab/> </Expression> <Expression Name='SecondWordLabNotEmpty'> (<SecondWordLab/> == '') ? '___Empty___' : <SecondWordLab/> </Expression> <Expression Name='FirstTwoWordsLabNotEmpty'> (<FirstTwoWordsLab/> == '') ? '___Empty___' : <FirstTwoWordsLab/> </Expression> <Expression Name='LabNameUpToCommaNotEmpty'> (<LabNameUpToComma/> == '') ? '___Empty___' : <LabNameUpToComma/> </Expression>
</Declarations>
<!-- Add spatial info to address fields --> <Query Default='True'><Attribute SpatialMode='Only'>../../../LabInfo/Name</Attribute><Attribute SpatialMode='Only'>../../../LabInfo/Address/City</Attribute><Attribute SpatialMode='Only'>../../../LabInfo/Address/State</Attribute><Attribute SpatialMode='Only'>../../../LabInfo/Address/ZipCode</Attribute></Query>
<Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabCode IS NOT NULL AND LabCode = SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../LabCode</Attribute>,1,25)</SQL></Query>
<!-- Look for exact name match --> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE LOWER(<Attribute SelectionMode='FIRST'>../../../LabInfo/Name</Attribute>) + '%'</SQL></Query>
<!-- Look for extracted Address1 and City/Zip for match --> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE Address1 LIKE <Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/Address1</Attribute> and Zip LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/ZipCode</Attribute>,1,5) + '%'</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE Address1 LIKE <Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/Address1</Attribute> and City LIKE LOWER(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/City</Attribute>) + '%'</SQL></Query>
<!-- Look for Digits and 3+ character non-directional and non-street string in extracted Address1 and City for match --> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE Address1 LIKE '%' + LOWER(<DigitsNotEmpty/>) + '%' + LOWER(<StreetNotEmpty/>) + '%' and City LIKE LOWER(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/City</Attribute>) + '%'</SQL></Query>
<!-- Look for Digits in extracted Address1 and matching City or 1st 5 of ZipCode for match --> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE Address1 LIKE '%' + LOWER(<DigitsNotEmpty/>) + '%' and Zip LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/ZipCode</Attribute>,1,5) + '%'</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE Address1 LIKE '%' + LOWER(<DigitsNotEmpty/>) + '%' and City LIKE '%' + LOWER(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/City</Attribute>) + '%'</SQL></Query>
<!-- Look for 3+ character non-ordinal and non-street string in extracted Address1 and City or 1st 5 of ZipCode for match --> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE Address1 LIKE '%' + LOWER(<StreetNotEmpty/>) + '%' and Zip LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/ZipCode</Attribute>,1,5) + '%'</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE Address1 LIKE '%' + LOWER(<StreetNotEmpty/>) + '%' and City LIKE LOWER(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/City</Attribute>) + '%'</SQL></Query>
<!-- Look for Name of extracted LabName, minus common phrases, and matching LabName for match --> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(<Attribute SelectionMode='FIRST'>../../../LabInfo/Name</Attribute>, ' ', '%'), 'LABORATORY', '%'),'LABORATORIES', '%'), 'MEDICAL', '%') + '%'</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(<Attribute SelectionMode='FIRST'>../../../LabInfo/Name</Attribute>, ' ', '%'), 'LABORATORY', '%'),'LABORATORIES', '%'), 'MEDICAL', '%'), 'CENTER', '%') + '%'</SQL></Query>
<!-- Look for substring of extracted LabName and matching Street Number, City, or Zip for match --> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + LOWER(<FirstTwoWordsLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' and Zip LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/ZipCode</Attribute>,1,5) + '%'</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + LOWER(<FirstTwoWordsLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' and City LIKE '%' + LOWER(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/City</Attribute>) + '%'</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + LOWER(<FirstTwoWordsLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' and Address1 LIKE '%' + LOWER(<DigitsNotEmpty/>) + '%'</SQL></Query>
<Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + LOWER(<FiveCharLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' + LOWER(<SecondWordLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' and Zip LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/ZipCode</Attribute>,1,5) + '%'</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + LOWER(<FiveCharLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' + LOWER(<SecondWordLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' and City LIKE '%' + LOWER(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/City</Attribute>) + '%'</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + LOWER(<FiveCharLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' + LOWER(<SecondWordLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' and Address1 LIKE '%' + LOWER(<DigitsNotEmpty/>) + '%'</SQL></Query>
<Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + LOWER(<FiveCharLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' and Zip LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/ZipCode</Attribute>,1,5) + '%'</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + LOWER(<FiveCharLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' and City LIKE '%' + LOWER(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/City</Attribute>) + '%'</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + LOWER(<FiveCharLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' and Address1 LIKE '%' + LOWER(<DigitsNotEmpty/>) + '%'</SQL></Query>
<Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + LOWER(<SecondWordLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' and Zip LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/ZipCode</Attribute>,1,5) + '%'</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + LOWER(<SecondWordLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' and City LIKE '%' + LOWER(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/City</Attribute>) + '%'</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + LOWER(<SecondWordLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' and Address1 LIKE '%' + LOWER(<DigitsNotEmpty/>) + '%'</SQL></Query>
<!-- Look for LabName substrings after replacement and also for Zip or City --> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(UPPER(<Attribute SelectionMode='FIRST'>../../../LabInfo/Name</Attribute>), ' ', '%'), 'LABORATORY', '%'),'LABORATORIES', '%'), 'MEDICAL', '%'), 1, 10) + '%' and Zip LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/ZipCode</Attribute>,1,5) + '%'</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(UPPER(<Attribute SelectionMode='FIRST'>../../../LabInfo/Name</Attribute>), ' ', '%'), 'LABORATORY', '%'),'LABORATORIES', '%'), 'MEDICAL', '%'), 1, 10) + '%' and City LIKE '%' + LOWER(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/City</Attribute>) + '%'</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE SUBSTRING(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(UPPER(<Attribute SelectionMode='FIRST'>../../../LabInfo/Name</Attribute>), ' ', '%'), 'LABORATORY', '%'),'LABORATORIES', '%'), 'MEDICAL', '%'), 1, 3) + '%' and Zip LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/ZipCode</Attribute>,1,5) + '%'</SQL></Query>
<!-- Look for Digits and 3+ character non-directional and not-street string in extracted Address1 --> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE Address1 LIKE '%' + LOWER(<DigitsNotEmpty/>) + '%' + LOWER(<StreetNotEmpty/>) + '%'</SQL></Query>
<!-- Look for 1st two words then 1st two words after 1st 5-letter word for match --> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + LOWER(<FirstTwoWordsLabNotEmpty/>) + '%'</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + LOWER(<FiveCharLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' + LOWER(<SecondWordLabNotEmpty/>) + '%'</SQL></Query>
<!-- Look for substring of extracted labname + extracted City in LabName for match --> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE LabName LIKE '%' + LOWER(<FiveCharLabNotEmpty/>) + '%' + LOWER(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/City</Attribute>) + '%'</SQL></Query>
<!-- Look for entire ZipCode in extracted Zip for match --> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE Zip LIKE LOWER(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/ZipCode</Attribute>) + '%'</SQL></Query>
<!-- Look for just first 5 of ZipCode in extracted Zip for match --> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabName FROM LabAddresses WHERE Zip LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../../../LabInfo/Address/ZipCode</Attribute>,1,5) + '%'</SQL></Query>

data.name: _testName.AutoUpdateQuery
data.value: <Query><SQL>SELECT Name FROM LabOrder WHERE EpicCode = SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../EpicCode</Attribute>,1,25)</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT Name FROM LabOrder WHERE Code = SUBSTRING(<Attribute>.</Attribute>,1,25)</SQL></Query>

data.name: _testName.ValidationQuery
data.value: <Declarations> <SQL Name='MandatoryTests'>SELECT TestCode FROM LabOrderTest INNER JOIN LabOrder ON LabOrderTest.OrderCode = LabOrder.Code WHERE LabOrder.Code = <Attribute>../OrderCode</Attribute> AND Mandatory = 1</SQL> <Attribute Name='ExistingTests' SelectionMode='List'>../Component/TestCode</Attribute> <Expression Name='MissingTests'> (<MandatoryTests Type='string[]'/> - <ExistingTests Type='string[]'/>).sort() </Expression> <Complex Name='ValidationMessage'>Missing mandatory test(s): <MissingTests StringList=', '/></Complex> </Declarations> <Query><SQL>SELECT Name FROM LabOrder WHERE EpicCode IS NOT NULL ORDER BY Name</SQL></Query> <Query ValidationListType='ValidationListOnly' ValidValue='' ValidationMessage='ValidationMessage' ValidationWarning='1'> <MissingTests/> </Query>

data.name: _componentName.AutoUpdateQuery
data.value: <Query><SQL>SELECT LabTest.OfficialName FROM LabTest INNER JOIN LabOrderTest On LabTest.TestCode = LabOrderTest.TestCode WHERE LabOrderTest.OrderCode = SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../OrderCode</Attribute>,1,25) AND LabTest.TestCode = SUBSTRING(<Attribute>TestCode</Attribute>,1,25)</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabTest.OfficialName FROM LabTest, AlternateTestName, LabOrderTest WHERE LabTest.TestCode = AlternateTestName.TestCode AND LabTest.TestCode = LabOrderTest.TestCode AND LabOrderTest.OrderCode = SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../OrderCode</Attribute>,1,25) AND AlternateTestName.Name = SUBSTRING(<Attribute>.</Attribute>,1,50)</SQL></Query> <Query><SQL>SELECT LabTest.OfficialName FROM LabTest INNER JOIN LabOrderTest On LabTest.TestCode = LabOrderTest.TestCode WHERE LabOrderTest.OrderCode = SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../OrderCode</Attribute>,1,25) AND LabTest.TestCode = SUBSTRING(<Attribute>.</Attribute>,1,25)</SQL></Query>

data.name: _componentName.ValidationQuery
data.value: <SQL>SELECT LabTest.OfficialName FROM LabTest INNER JOIN LabOrderTest On LabTest.TestCode = LabOrderTest.TestCode WHERE LabOrderTest.OrderCode = SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../OrderCode</Attribute>,1,25) ORDER BY LabTest.OfficialName</SQL>

data.name: _testCode.AutoUpdateQuery
data.value: <SQL>SELECT LabTest.TestCode FROM LabTest INNER JOIN LabOrderTest On LabTest.TestCode = LabOrderTest.TestCode WHERE LabOrderTest.OrderCode = SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../../OrderCode</Attribute>,1,25) AND OfficialName = SUBSTRING(<Attribute>..</Attribute>,1,255)</SQL>

data.name: _testCode.ValidationQuery
data.value: <SQL>SELECT LabTest.TestCode FROM LabTest INNER JOIN LabOrderTest On LabTest.TestCode = LabOrderTest.TestCode WHERE LabOrderTest.OrderCode = SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../../OrderCode</Attribute>,1,25) ORDER BY LabTest.TestCode</SQL>

data.name: _componentFlag.ValidationQuery
data.value: <Declarations> <Attribute Name='Flag'>.</Attribute> <!--Allow for value of #, #-#, >#, <#, >=#, <=#, >/=#, <=#--> <Expression Name='RawValue'> <RegEx Pattern='[\s></=]{0,3}[\d\.]+'><Attribute >../Value</Attribute></RegEx>.Replace(',','').Replace('/','') </Expression> <!--ValueOperator is non-empty if the value is expressed in terms of a range. Example >30--> <Expression Name='ValueOperator'> <RawValue/>.Contains('>') ? '>' : <RawValue/>.Contains('<') ? '<' : '' </Expression> <!--After extracting the ValueOperator, convert the value into a single number--> <Expression Name='Value'><RawValue/>.Replace('>', '').Replace('<', '').Replace(' ', '')</Expression> <Attribute Name='Range'>../Range</Attribute> <!--Allow for range of #, #-#, >#, <#, >=#, <=#, >/=#, <=#--> <Expression Name='MinValueOrEqual' > (<ValueOperator/> == '>') <!--If the value is a "greater than" range, allow the number to be greater then or equal to the min value.--> ? <RegEx Pattern='(?<=>(\s?/?=)?\s?)[\d\.,]+'><Range/></RegEx>.Replace(',','').Replace('/','') <!--Otherwise, --> : <RegEx Pattern='(^\s*([\d\.,]+)\s*$)|([\d\.,]+(?=\s?-\s?\d+))|((?<=>\s?/?=\s?)[\d\.,]+)'><Range/></RegEx>.Replace(',','').Replace('/','') </Expression> <Expression Name='MinValueNotEqual'> string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MinValueOrEqual/>) ? <RegEx Pattern='(?<=>\s?)[\d\.,]+'><Range/></RegEx>.Replace(',','') : '' </Expression> <Expression Name='MaxValueOrEqual' > (<ValueOperator/> == '<') ? <RegEx Pattern='(?<=<(\s?/?=)?\s?)[\d\.,]+'><Range/></RegEx>.Replace(',','').Replace('/','') : <RegEx Pattern='(^\s*([\d\.,]+)\s*$)|((?<=\d+\s?-\s?)[\d\.,]+)|((?<=<\s?/?=\s?)[\d\.,]+)'><Range/></RegEx>.Replace(',','').Replace('/','') </Expression> <Expression Name='MaxValueNotEqual'> string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MaxValueOrEqual/>) ? <RegEx Pattern='(?<=<\s?)[\d\.,]+'><Range/></RegEx>.Replace(',','') : '' </Expression> <RegEx Name='LowFlag' Pattern='^L|^A$'><Flag/></RegEx> <RegEx Name='HighFlag' Pattern='^H|^A$'><Flag/></RegEx> <Expression Name='HasProperLowFlag'> <!--If we don't have a value and a range minimum to compare consider low range boundary validated--> string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<Value/>) or (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MinValueOrEqual/>) and string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MinValueNotEqual/>)) or <!--Compare using >= check if appropriate--> (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MinValueOrEqual/>) == false and (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<LowFlag/>) == (<Value Type='double'/> >= <MinValueOrEqual Type='double'/>))) or <!--Compare using > check if appropriate--> (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MinValueNotEqual/>) == false and (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<LowFlag/>) == (<Value Type='double'/> > <MinValueNotEqual Type='double'/>))) </Expression> <Expression Name='HasProperHighFlag'> <!--If we don't have a value and a range maximum to compare consider high range boundary validated--> string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<Value/>) or (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MaxValueOrEqual/>) and string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MaxValueNotEqual/>)) or <!--Compare using >= check if appropriate--> (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MaxValueOrEqual/>) == false and (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<HighFlag/>) == (<Value Type='double'/> <= <MaxValueOrEqual Type='double'/>))) or <!--Compare using > check if appropriate--> (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MaxValueNotEqual/>) == false and (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<HighFlag/>) == (<Value Type='double'/> < <MaxValueNotEqual Type='double'/>))) </Expression> <!--Prevents use of inappropriate flag when the range has only a min or a max value--> <Expression Name='SpecialRangeCheck'> <!--Consider the special range check validated if there is no value or range specified--> (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<Value/>) or (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MinValueOrEqual/>) and string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MinValueNotEqual/>) and string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MaxValueOrEqual/>) and string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MaxValueNotEqual/>))) or <!--Disallow a low flag if no range minimum is specified--> ((string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<LowFlag/>) or !string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MinValueOrEqual/>) or !string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MinValueNotEqual/>)) and <!--Disallow a high flag if no range maximum is specified--> (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<HighFlag/>) or !string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MaxValueOrEqual/>) or !string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(<MaxValueNotEqual/>))) </Expression> </Declarations> <Query>[BLANK]<SQL>SELECT * FROM Flag ORDER BY Flag</SQL></Query> <Query ValidValue='True' ValidationListType='ValidationListOnly' ValidationWarning='1'> <Expression> <HasProperLowFlag Type='bool'/> and <HasProperHighFlag Type='bool'/> and <SpecialRangeCheck Type='bool'/> </Expression> </Query>

data.name: _orderingPhysicianCodeColumn.AutoUpdateQuery
data.value: <Query><SQL>SELECT Code FROM Physician WHERE LastName LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../Last</Attribute>,1,50) + '%' AND FirstName LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../First</Attribute>,1,30) + '%' AND (MiddleName IS NULL OR MiddleName = '' OR MiddleName LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../Middle</Attribute>,1,30) + '%') ORDER BY Code</SQL></Query>

data.name: _orderingPhysicianCodeColumn.ValidationQuery
data.value: <SQL>SELECT Code FROM Physician WHERE LastName LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../Last</Attribute>,1,50) + '%' AND FirstName LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../First</Attribute>,1,30) + '%' AND (MiddleName IS NULL OR MiddleName = '' OR MiddleName LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../Middle</Attribute>,1,30) + '%' ) ORDER BY Code</SQL>

data.name: _physicianCode.AutoUpdateQuery
data.value: <Query><SQL>SELECT Code FROM Physician WHERE LastName LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../Last</Attribute>,1,50) + '%' AND FirstName LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../First</Attribute>,1,30) + '%' AND (MiddleName IS NULL OR MiddleName = '' OR MiddleName LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../Middle</Attribute>,1,30) + '%') ORDER BY Code</SQL></Query>

data.name: _physicianCode.ValidationQuery
data.value: <SQL>SELECT Code FROM Physician WHERE LastName LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../Last</Attribute>,1,50) + '%' AND FirstName LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../First</Attribute>,1,30) + '%' AND (MiddleName IS NULL OR MiddleName = '' OR MiddleName LIKE SUBSTRING(<Attribute>../Middle</Attribute>,1,30) + '%') ORDER BY Code</SQL>
